verses.name: 2 Corinthians 2:1
verses.text: But I determined this with myself, that I would not come again to you in heaviness.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 2:2
verses.text: For if I make you sorry, who is he then that maketh me glad, but the same which is made sorry by me?

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 2:3
verses.text: And I wrote this same unto you, lest, when I came, I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice; having confidence in you all, that my joy is the joy of you all.
